mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.accident_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.assets_operator , t1.operator_dept , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.occur_time , t1.report_leader_time , t1.report_time , t1.accident_process , t1.accident_consequence , t1.reason_analysis , t1.prevention_measures , t1.repair_time , t1.stop_work_days , t1.direct_economic_loss , t1.accident_property , t1.assets_man , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_accident_proc t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.ACCIDENT_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.accidentNo}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByTel}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.ASSETS_OPERATOR like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetsOperator}),'%')
and t1.OPERATOR_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.operatorDept}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
and t1.OCCUR_TIME >= #{bean.occurTimeBegin}
and t1.OCCUR_TIME <= #{bean.occurTimeEnd}
and t1.REPORT_LEADER_TIME >= #{bean.reportLeaderTimeBegin}
and t1.REPORT_LEADER_TIME <= #{bean.reportLeaderTimeEnd}
and t1.REPORT_TIME >= #{bean.reportTimeBegin}
and t1.REPORT_TIME <= #{bean.reportTimeEnd}
and t1.ACCIDENT_PROCESS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.accidentProcess}),'%')
and t1.ACCIDENT_CONSEQUENCE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.accidentConsequence}),'%')
and t1.REASON_ANALYSIS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reasonAnalysis}),'%')
and t1.PREVENTION_MEASURES like concat(concat('%',#{bean.preventionMeasures}),'%')
and t1.REPAIR_TIME >= #{bean.repairTimeBegin}
and t1.REPAIR_TIME <= #{bean.repairTimeEnd}
and t1.STOP_WORK_DAYS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.stopWorkDays}),'%')
and t1.DIRECT_ECONOMIC_LOSS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.directEconomicLoss}),'%')
and t1.ACCIDENT_PROPERTY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.accidentProperty}),'%')
and t1.ASSETS_MAN like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetsMan}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_25 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute25}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.accident_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.assets_operator , t1.operator_dept , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.occur_time , t1.report_leader_time , t1.report_time , t1.accident_process , t1.accident_consequence , t1.reason_analysis , t1.prevention_measures , t1.repair_time , t1.stop_work_days , t1.direct_economic_loss , t1.accident_property , t1.assets_man , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_accident_proc t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_

or t1.ACCIDENT_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.accidentNo}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')

or t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
or t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
or t1.OCCUR_TIME >= #{bean.occurTimeBegin}
or t1.OCCUR_TIME <= #{bean.occurTimeEnd}
or t1.REPORT_LEADER_TIME >= #{bean.reportLeaderTimeBegin}
or t1.REPORT_LEADER_TIME <= #{bean.reportLeaderTimeEnd}
or t1.REPORT_TIME >= #{bean.reportTimeBegin}
or t1.REPORT_TIME <= #{bean.reportTimeEnd}
or t1.ACCIDENT_PROCESS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.accidentProcess}),'%')

or t1.REPAIR_TIME >= #{bean.repairTimeBegin}
or t1.REPAIR_TIME <= #{bean.repairTimeEnd}

and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}

select t1.id , t1.accident_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.assets_operator , t1.operator_dept , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.occur_time , t1.report_leader_time , t1.report_time , t1.accident_process , t1.accident_consequence , t1.reason_analysis , t1.prevention_measures , t1.repair_time , t1.stop_work_days , t1.direct_economic_loss , t1.accident_property , t1.assets_man , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_accident_proc t1 where t1.id = #{id}
